title: Lesa Lesa Song Lyrics Lesa Lesa
stanzas:
Lesa lesa nee illaamal
vazhvadhu lesa
lesa lesa neenda kaala
uravidhu lesa

kadhal dhevan koyil
thaedi varugiradhe
viraivinile
color color kanavugal
vizhigalie
unakenae ulaginile
pirandhavale. (2)

Nana thoongi naalaachu
naalellaam paalaachu
kollaama ennai kondru
vadhaikkiradhe

Vevvaeru paerodu
vazhndhaalum vaeralla
naan vaangum moochukaatru
unadhallavaaa
undhegam oadum raththam
enathallavaaa (2)

Nee endral naanthaan
endru uravariya oorariya
oruvaril oruvaril uyir karaiya
udanadiyaai udhadugalaal
uyil ezhudhu..

Lesa lesa nee illaamal
vazhvadhu lesa
lesa lesa neenda kaala
....

seo.title: Lesa Lesa Song Lyrics Lesa Lesa
seo.description: Get the complete Lesa Lesa Song Lyrics Lesa Lesa from Lesa Lesa. Read the lyrics penned by Vaali and composed by Harrish Jeyaraj and sung by Anuradha Sriram. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vaali, Lesa Lesa, Harrish Jeyaraj, Anuradha Sriram, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
